statements: DELETE FROM drone_inventory WHERE item_type = 'Quadcopter' AND quantity < 5;
DELETE FROM drone_inventory WHERE id = 1 AND location = 'Warehouse A';
DELETE FROM drone_inventory WHERE last_maintenance_date < '2022-01-01' AND quantity > 10;
DELETE FROM Drone_Equipment WHERE equipment_id = 100 AND quantity > 5;
DELETE FROM Spare_Parts WHERE quantity <= 10 AND compatible_equipment = 'Drone Model X';
DELETE FROM spare_parts WHERE location = 'Main Warehouse';
DELETE FROM Maintenance_Log WHERE maintenance_type = 'Monthly Check';
